statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance;
SELECT session_id, session_date, participant_name FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT session_date, participant_name FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT participant_id, count(participant_id) as participants_count FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance GROUP BY participant_id ORDER BY participants_count DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, participant_id, participant_name, attended FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE participant_id = 100 ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, COUNT(session_id) as total_sessions_attended FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_sessions_attended > 5
SELECT participant_name, session_date FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE ORDER BY session_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT participant_name, COUNT(DISTINCT session_date) as total_days_attended FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance GROUP BY participant_name ORDER BY total_days_attended DESC
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT trainer_name, attendee_count FROM training_sessions WHERE attendee_count > 10;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT attendee_name, feedback_text FROM attendee_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_id = 1
SELECT session_id, session_date, trainer_name FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT attendee_name, feedback_text FROM attendee_feedback WHERE session_id = 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT AVG(attendee_count) as avg_attendee_count FROM training_sessions
SELECT trainer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedback FROM training_sessions JOIN attendee_feedback ON training_sessions.session_id = attendee_feedback.session_id GROUP BY trainer_name
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions;
SELECT session_id, date, topic FROM TrainingSessions WHERE presenter = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Trainer' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, name, email FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Participant' LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY session_id;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT presenter, topic, date, start_time FROM TrainingSessions WHERE end_time < '15:00';
SELECT presenter, COUNT(*) as total_sessions FROM TrainingSessions GROUP BY presenter;

SELECT Participants.name as participant_name, TrainingSessions.topic, Attendance.attended FROM Participants JOIN Attendance ON Participants.participant_id = Attendance.participant_id JOIN TrainingSessions ON Attendance.session_id = TrainingSessions.session_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attended = TRUE AND participant_id = 'f7f49c6b-eb35-449b-aa29-106e15cacb02';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT topic, session_date, session_time FROM training_sessions;
SELECT trainer_id, AVG(experience_years) AS average_experience FROM trainers GROUP BY trainer_id;
SELECT attendee_name, email, company FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 100;
SELECT session_id, rating, feedback FROM evaluations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, topic, trainer_id FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer_id = 3;
SELECT trainer_name, expertise, experience_years FROM trainers WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, company FROM attendees WHERE company LIKE '%Tech%' AND attendee_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT session_id, rating, feedback FROM evaluations WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY session_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession;
SELECT session_date, attendee_name FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT session_id, session_duration FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessionFeedback WHERE feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, attendee_name FROM RemoteWorkTrainingSession WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT attendance_id, attending_status FROM TrainingSessionAttendance WHERE session_id = 5 AND attendee_id = 10;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM TrainingSessionFeedback WHERE session_id = 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM AttendeeSkills WHERE skill_2 = 'Programming' OR skill_3 = 'Communication' ORDER BY attendee_id ASC;
